short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open a new tab with today's news and a custom search box

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the ultimate browsing companion - a Chrome extension that adds a personalized touch to your browsing experience! With this extension, you can stay up-to-date with the latest news and search for custom topics that interest you.

With this extension, your new tab page will automatically display bookmarks to the top news and social websites, including sites like Amazon, Gmail, Facebook, Instagram, Youtube. You'll be able to browse through the latest headlines and social media posts with just a click, making it easier than ever to stay informed about what's happening in the world.

The custom search feed feature enables you to search for topics of your choice directly from your browser. No need to open another tab or navigate to a search engine; simply type in your keywords and browse through the results without leaving the page you're on.

With this extension, you can enjoy a seamless browsing experience that caters to your interests and saves you time. Install now and start exploring the web with ease!
